alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Mason; Menard; Morgan; Sangamon; Schuyler (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 07 at 9:35PM CDT until May 07 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southwestern Mason County in central Illinois... Southwestern Menard County in central Illinois... Northwestern Sangamon County in central Illinois... Cass County in west central Illinois... Southwestern Fulton County in west central Illinois... Northeastern Morgan County in west central Illinois... Northeastern Schuyler County in west central Illinois... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 935 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Springfield, Virginia, Petersburg, Ashland, Astoria, Pleasant Plains, Chandlerville, Tallula, Bath, Kilbourne, Browning, Grandview, Oakford, Philadelphia, Newmansville, Snicarte, Atterberry, Prentice, Bluff City and Marbletown. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Fulton; Mason; Menard; Morgan; Sangamon; Schuyler
